alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Louis County through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Voyageurs National Park, or 33 miles southeast of International Falls, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported dime-sized hail at 315 PM in Voyageurs National Park. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crane Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
